derivation: from G4862 (συναρμολογέω) and a derivative of a compound of G719 (συναρμολογέω) and G3004 (συναρμολογέω) (in its original sense of laying);
strongs_def: to render close-jointed together, i.e. organize compactly
outline:
1. to join closely together
  2. to frame together
    1. parts of a building
    2. the members of the body
